query.description: Get a particular page of data
The number of results in a page

Control how archived entites are returned
  * `yes` - Return both archived and non archived entites
  * `no` - Do not return archived entites

item.name: Get data about a particular event

query.description:
Filter events by closing date:
  * `yes` - Return only events that have passed the closing date
  * `no` - Return only events that do not have a closing date or the closing date has not passed

Control how archived entites are returned
  * `yes` - Return both archived and non archived entites
  * `no` - Do not return archived entites
  * `only` - Return only archived entites

Filter events by status
  * `active` - Events which have not yet ended but may or may not have started
  * `current` - Events which have started and have not yet ended
  * `future` - Events which have already ended
  * `past` - Events that have not yet started

variable.description: The ID of the event we are interested in

item.name: Get a page of event data

query.description: Filter events by searching by name
Sort top level events by field(s)
Get a particular page of data
The number of results in a page
Filter results to entites assigned a cateory

Filter events by closing date:
  * `yes` - Return only events that have passed the closing date
  * `no` - Return only events that do not have a closing date or the closing date has not passed

Filter events by status
  * `active` - Events which have not yet ended but may or may not have started
  * `current` - Events which have started and have not yet ended
  * `future` - Events which have already ended
  * `past` - Events that have not yet started

response.name: The returned page of event data
